attributes.action: change the law with regard to child abuse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the law needs to be changed so that having knowledge of what is happening and not doing anything about it is as punishable as actually commiting child abuse.We need prison sentences for these monsters otherwise we are letting them free to do it again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
